sense.name: arrangement
sense.commentary: understanding the statement of an exchange of promises, the thing arranged or agreed to (Often preceeded by a definite - like "the", never preceeded by "in")
sense.examples: There was an agreement between management and the workers. They had an agreement that they would not interfere in each other's business. The couple's agreement was to meet in Chicago.

sense.name: compatibility
sense.commentary: compatibility of observations, harmony between things (often preceded by a preposition - like "in", never preceeded by "the")
sense.examples: There was no agreement between theory and measurement. The results of the two test were in agreement. The two parties were in agreement.

sense.name: grammatical
sense.commentary: the determination of grammatical inflection on the basis of word relations.
sense.examples: When editing a letter always proofread to make sure all pronouns agree in number.
